Title: Generic Controls
Description: A set of generic controls that take advantage dynamic querying and generics.
HomeWiki:
Generic-based ASP.NET Controls

Provide a simple set of replacement controls that take advantage of advanced auto-filtering and dynamic LINQ expressions. This is a proof of concept project and is meant to be run in the VS2008 environment along with .NET 3.5. Apparently, in VS2010, some of the things related to the ControlBuilder are broken and/or fixed, depending on how you want to look at it.
